I'm currently in development on a typeface inspired by the Bob's Big Boy signage in California. Just an FYI. . .

cool thanks for the heads up (i'll keep mine private then).
"lithom" looks great, the first paragraph also, but the & ligature looks sort of strange... Very nice though.
